item.title: The L.A. protests over immigration raids could actually help Trump pass his megabill. Here’s how.
item.description: Polls show more support for the president’s immigration policy than his policies on the economy or inflation.

item.title: Shipping activity to the U.S. from China just flashed a hopeful sign for the stock market
item.description: Summer is a crucial transport time for retailers ahead of back-to-school season and the holidays.

item.title: Summer doldrums are slowing stock trading — but don’t sell a dull market short
item.description: Declining volume doesn’t necessarily mean lower share prices.

item.title: My daughter will be on Medicaid for life. Can my wife and I invest in the stock market?
item.description: Consider a special-needs trust, in addition to other safeguards.
